SA22n1424:13: sattvārthe naiva bhavyo yatsa dbhistaiḥ syurguṇā hyamī ||6 ||
SA22n1424:73: kṣi jra kha ga ṣkamityebhiḥ sa bījācca yathākramam ||34 ||
SA22n1424:75: jaḥ hū vaṃ hoḥ khamityete ra bījācca bahiḥsthitān ||35 ||
SA22n1424:79: bu ā jrī-bhiśca kha hū-bhyāṃ sarvadharmān samutsṛjet ||37 ||
SA22n1424:80: om āḥ hū iti taccittaṃ bhāsvaddhobhyāṃ vidarbhitam |
SA22n1424:287: sandhyāntare'pi pūjādi japaṃ kṛtvā tu pūrvavat |
SA22n1424:319: om bhūḥ khamiti mantreṇa viyadbhūtāṃ vasundharām |
SA22n1424:320: hū la hū iti vajrātmakṣmāṃ kṛtvā tāmadhiṣṭhayet ||148 ||
SA22n1424:352: om gha gha ghātaya ghātaya sarvaduṣṭān phaṭ kīlaya kīlaya sarvapāpān phaṭ hū hū hū vajra kīla[ya] vajradhara ājñāpayati kāyavākcittavajra kīlaya hū phaṭ |
SA22n1424:361: kṣmāṃ saṃlipya sugandhādyaiścitraiḥ puṣpaiḥ prakīrya ca |
SA22n1424:372: pratidinaṃ trisandhyāsu baliṃ datvā tathā japet |
SA22n1424:400: paralokaṃ samuddiśya śraddhāṃ kṛtvā ca bhūyasīm |
SA22n1424:404: evamuktvā tu tān śiṣyān dhiyā sā(svā)
SA22n1424:409: dehi me samayaṃ tattvaṃ bodhicittaṃ ca dehi me |
SA22n1424:410: buddhaṃ dharmaṃ ca saṃghaṃ ca dehi me śaraṇatrayam ||190 ||
SA22n1424:413: prathānaṃ śiṣyamekaṃ tu kṛtvā brūyādidaṃ vacaḥ |
SA22n1424:425: vajramabjaṃ tathā cakraṃ hū āḥ om teṣu vinyaset ||197 ||
SA22n1424:428: puṣpaṃ mūrdhni puro dhūpaṃ dīpaṃ gandhaṃ punarhṛdi |
SA22n1424:434: ācamya tricalupānaṃ dattvā bāhye niveśya ca |
SA22n1424:437: tricalupānamantraḥ-om hrīḥ viśuddhadharma sarvapāpāni cāsya śodhaya sarvavikalpānapanaya hū |
SA22n1424:438: sarvajñānāṃ kadā loke sambhavo jāyate na vā |
SA22n1424:444: tatsarvaṃ hi kṣayaṃ yāti dṛṣṭvā maṇḍalamīdṛśam ||205 ||
SA22n1424:446: padaṃ hyanuttaraṃ yāti japanvai mantra(ntraṃ) tāyinām ||206 ||
SA22n1424:450: yena yūyaṃ jinaiḥ sarvaiḥ saputrairiha śāsane ||208 ||
SA22n1424:468: yogamādhāya saccakraṃ saṃpūjya khe dhiyā nyaset ||216 ||
SA22n1424:480: trijjaḥ kāraistamāpreṣya jjaḥ jjaḥ jjaḥ ityapi svayaṃ punaḥ ||222 ||
SA22n1424:525: śvetaṃ pītaṃ tathā raktaṃ haritaṃ kṛṣṇameva ca |
SA22n1424:543: om amṛtakuṇḍali kha-kha-khāhi-khāhi tiṣṭha-tiṣṭha bandha-bandha hana-hana daha- daha garja- garja visphoṭaya-visphoṭaya sarvavighnavināyakān mahāgaṇapatijīvitāntakarāya hū phaṭ |
SA22n1424:558: dvāreṣu sarvathā jñātvā sphuṭaṃ dhyātvā svacakrakam ||258 ||
SA22n1424:564: kṛtvā stutvātha saṃprīṇya japtvā vibhāvya toṣayet ||261 ||
SA22n1424:581: dhyātvā pītaṃ trivaktraṃ tu pīnaṃ prajñāṅgasaṅginam |
SA22n1424:591: juhvīta samidho dhanyaḥ samiddhe'gnau ghṛtaṃ tilān |
SA22n1424:597: om sarvapāpa dahanavajrāya sarvapāpaṃ daha svāhā |
SA22n1424:607: om svāhā hoḥ jaḥ hū hū phaṭ mantrānte cāpi codanā ||276 ||
SA22n1424:608: hṛtsattvāt svādhipāt sarvāḥ prīṇyante devatā iti |
SA22n1424:612: śeṣaṃ havyaṃ svayogātmā vahnau hutvātha taṃ tathā |
SA22n1424:618: pure śiṣyapraveśārthaṃ tattvaṃ satyaṃ ca śrāvayet ||281 ||
SA22n1424:624: tattvena siddha me bhagavan mahārāgo mahārata ||284 ||
SA22n1424:632: tena satyena me nātha kāmāṃstvaṃ paripūraya ||288 ||
SA22n1424:640: raktāmbaraṃ tadāsyaṃ ca pṛcchet kastvamiti priya |
SA22n1424:643: yogacittaṃ samutpādya hṛdi vajraṃ hṛdā nyaset ||293 ||
SA22n1424:644: mantraḥ- om sarvayogacittamutpādayāmi surate samayastvaṃ hoḥ sidhya vajra yathāsukham |
SA22n1424:646: na ca tvayedaṃ sarvatathāgataparamarahasyamamaṇḍalapraviṣṭāya vaktavyaṃ na cāśraddhā[ya dā]tavyamiti vācyam |
SA22n1424:650: tadahaṃ te vajrajñānamutpādayāmi yena jñānena tvaṃ sarvatathāgatasiddhīrapi prāpyasi kimutānyāḥ siddhīḥ |
SA22n1424:654: om vajrasattva svayaṃ te'dya hṛdaye samavasthitaḥ ||295 ||
SA22n1424:655: nirbhidya tatkṣaṇaṃ yāyād yadi brūyādimaṃ nayam |
SA22n1424:657: idaṃ te nārakaṃ vāri samayātikramād dahet |
SA22n1424:661: adyaprabhṛti tavāhaṃ vajrapāṇiryadahaṃ brūyāmima kuru tat tvayā kartavyam |
SA22n1424:662: na cāhamavamantavyo mā te viṣamāparihāreṇa kālakriyāṃ kṛtvā narakapatanaṃ syāt |
SA22n1424:666: vajrāṅkaṃ koṇamāhendre hū dhyāyāt pīta la bhave |
SA22n1424:667: vāruṇaṃ va bhavaṃ śuklaṃ ghaṭāṅka parimaṇḍalam ||298 ||
SA22n1424:668: nīladhvajāṅkaṃ dhanvābhaṃ vāyavyaṃ ya bhavaṃ calam |
SA22n1424:669: kāye vāci tayorhaḥ āḥ pādādho jhaiḥ samujjvalam ||299 ||
SA22n1424:671: āveśaya stobhaya rararara cālaya 2 hū haḥ āḥ jhaiḥ ||300 ||
SA22n1424:674: tamāveśaṃ dṛḍhīkurvan tiṣṭha vajreti taṃ lapet |
SA22n1424:675: prakṣepayet strajaṃ cakre pratīccha vajra hoḥ vadet ||302 ||
SA22n1424:676: tāṃ śirasi bandhayet pratigṛhṇa tvamimaṃ sattvaṃ mahābala |
SA22n1424:694: yadyad bhāti svasarvasvaṃ mukhyaṃ tanmañjurāṭ svayam |
SA22n1424:695: dharmāḥ śuddhāḥ prakṛtyā yad buddhajñānacayaḥ sa hi ||309 ||
SA22n1424:697: sarve sarvādhipatyā tu vajrānto he niyojitāḥ ||310 ||
SA22n1424:703: tvayāpi hi sadā dhāryaṃ vajrapāṇi dṛḍhavratam ||313 ||
SA22n1424:704: om sarvatathāgatasiddhivajrasamaye tiṣṭha eṣa tvāṃ dhārayāmi hīḥ hi hi hi hi hū |
SA22n1424:710: tvayāpi hi sadā dhāryā bodhiragrā jinairmatā |
SA22n1424:723: jñānārthī rāgiṇāṃ yogāt sādhayet sarvameva hi ||322 ||
SA22n1424:727: vajraṃ tattvena saṃgṛhya ghaṇṭāṃ dharmeṇa vādya ca |
SA22n1424:743: tatsmṛtistatra yā śraddhā prāgdvāraṃ bodhaye matam ||331 ||
SA22n1424:747: paścimaṃ ṛddhipādāstu dvāraṃ tat smṛtiratra tu ||333 ||
SA22n1424:764: prajñājñānāmṛtaṃ pītaṃ vajriṇāṃ kalaśaṃ tu tat |
SA22n1424:813: iyaṃ te dhāraṇī ramyā sevyā buddhaiḥ prakalpitā ||365 ||
SA22n1424:819: na tathā bodhicaryādyairanyai rvāpi nayaiḥ śubhaiḥ |
SA22n1424:831: he vajra nāma tathāgata siddhaye bhūrbhuvaḥ svaḥ |
SA22n1424:834: yathā yathā hi vinayaṃ sattvā yānti svabhāvataḥ |
SA22n1424:835: tathā tathā hi sattvārthaṃ kuryādrāgādibhiḥ śuciḥ ||374 ||
SA22n1424:858: bodhicittaṃ na vai tyājyaṃ yadvajramiti mudrayā |
SA22n1424:860: saddharmo na pratikṣepyo na ca tyājyaḥ kadācana |
SA22n1424:861: ajñānādvātha mohādvā na vai vivṛṇuyāt sa tu ||386 ||
SA22n1424:864: vajraṃ ghaṇṭā ca mudrā ca na vai tyājyā kadācana |
SA22n1424:870: anurūpaṃ ca te deyaṃ gurubhaktaṃ sadakṣiṇam |
SA22n1424:871: tato jvarādayastāpā na bhūyaḥ prabhavanti hi ||392 ||
SA22n1424:873: nityaṃ ca gurave deyaṃ sarvabuddhasamo hyasau ||393 ||
SA22n1424:876: adya vaḥ saphalaṃ janma yadasmin supratiṣṭhitāḥ |
SA22n1424:881: adya mārān vinirjitya praviṣṭāḥ paramaṃ puram |
SA22n1424:900: dattvārthine rajaḥ stokaṃ mahattoye rajaḥ sṛjet ||405 ||
SA22n1424:901: garttāpūre pratiṣṭhāyāṃ home cakre ca yaddhanam |
SA22n1424:924: manasokto vidhiḥ śreṣṭho vāṅmātreṇātra kiṃ bhavet ||416 ||
